title: Fuel distribution to run smoothly, assures CPC
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation said that the distribution of fuel will take place as usual on Wednesday (8).
The Ministry of Power and Energy said that the demand for fuel has increased rapidly.
Meanwhile, there were long queues in several areas on Tuesday (7) to obtain diesel, petrol, and kerosene.
